item.title: CVE-2023-47226|2024-09-04T13:48:53.014Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- post%20sliders%20%26%20post%20grids
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution Post Sliders & Post Grids plugin <=Â 1.0.20 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-27960|2024-08-02T00:41:55.886Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- email%20subscription%20popup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution Email Subscription Popup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Email Subscription Popup: from n/a through 1.2.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-27989|2024-08-02T00:41:56.014Z -- i%20thirteen%20web%20solution -- wp%20responsive%20tabs%20horizontal%20vertical%20and%20accordion%20tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in I Thirteen Web Solution WP Responsive Tabs horizontal vertical and accordion Tabs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Responsive Tabs horizontal vertical and accordion Tabs: from n/a through 1.1.17.
